name: Quakzh - Remixable FPS multiplayer game
description:
Hi all, 

Me and my team released a small project : QuakeCraft, but on Cubzh. It's called Quakzh. It's a FPS game, in voxel. It's open-source so you can copy-paste the code and make it yours either by just changing the map or by adding new features on top of it. 

Here is the link to the game: https://app.cu.bzh/?worldID=3ddb4a98-2fc7-4658-995a-26616363bf2d

Here are the five steps on how to remix the game: 

1. Play "Quakzh" on https://app.cu.bzh/?worldID=3ddb4a98-2fc7-4658-995a-26616363bf2d…
-->press ESCAPE to show menu
--> Read code (just press the button, no need to read the whole thing)
--> Copy the code (ctrl-A, ctrl-C)

2. Create your map
--> Open Item Editor under "Create" menu
--> Name your map
--> Place cubes to build a map

3. Create your world/game 
--> Create a new world
--> Paste the code you previously copied
--> Import your map replacing the name in the Config (.)

4. Share with your friends 
--> Press ESCAPE
--> Copy the link to your game
--> Share the link with your friends (+ on Cubzh Discord!)
